original_text: After they had moved the Covenant Box to Gath, the Lord punished the people in that city too. He made them all very afraid. He caused tumours to grow on them, young people as well as old people.
korean_text: 그것을 옮겨 간 후에 여호와의 손이 심히 큰 환난을 그 성읍에 더하사 성읍 사람들의 작은 자와 큰 자를 다 쳐서 독한 종기가 나게 하신지라

sentences.original_text: After they had moved the Covenant Box to Gath
the Lord punished the people in that city too
He made them all very afraid
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 그들 모두를 매우 두려워하게 하셨다

sentences.original_text: He caused tumours to grow on them
young people as well as old people
